fields.name: Pre dinner ( martini or cocktail glass )
Pre dinner (old fashioned or cobbler glass)
Long drink ( tumbler or fashion glass )

ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled
cocktail glass rimmed with crusted salt.

ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir
gently. Garnish with half orange slice and stirer.
puree into chilled flute, add gently chilled sparkling wine (white). Stir gently.

ingredients directly into highball with ice cubes, add several dashes
of Worchestershire Sauce, Tabasco, Salt and Pepper. Stir the ingredients. Garnish
with Celery Salt.

ingredients directly into highball filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish
   with lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and add a teaspoon
of sugar. Warm the mixture over a burner. Do not boil the mixture.

fields.directions:
Mix the ingredients directly in old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add
Soda Water. Garnish with half orange slice and lemon peel.
fields.name: AMERICANO

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled
cocktail glass .
fields.name: BACARDI COCKTAIL

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled
cocktail glass.
fields.name: DAIQUIRI

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into blender with crushed ice. Blend until slushy and smooth and pour
into chilled goblet.
fields.name: FROZEN DAIQUIRI

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients, with half fresh banana, into blender with crushed ice,
    blend until slushy. Pour into chilled goblet.
fields.name: BANANA DAIQUIRI

fields.directions:
Pour into shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well. Strain in chilled
cocktail or martini glass.
fields.name: BRONX

fields.directions: Pour Crème de Cassis into flute glass, top up with white wine.
fields.name: KIR

fields.directions: Pour Crème de Cassis into flute glass, top up with Champagne.
fields.name: KIR ROYAL

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into
chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
fields.name: MANHATTAN

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled
    martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
fields.name: MANHATTAN DRY

fields.directions: (Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe)
fields.name: MARGARITA

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well Strain in chilled
  martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
fields.name: MARTINI ( DRY )

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled
martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel and, or, maraschino cherry.
fields.name: MARTINI ( PERFECT )

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled
martini glass. If served "On the rocks ", pour ingredients and ice
into old fashioned glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
fields.name: MARTINI ( SWEET )

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into
martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink. Optional garnish:
green olive.
fields.name: MARTINI ( VODKA )

fields.directions:
Pour gin and vermouth into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well and strain
into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with silverskin onion.
fields.name: GIBSON

fields.directions: Optional : Splash of Soda Water.
fields.name: NEGRONI

fields.directions: Place suger cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, as a dash of soda water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky. Garnish with orange slice, lemon twist and two maraschino cherries
fields.name: OLD FASHIONED

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for
few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
fields.name: PARADISE

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into
chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry .
fields.name: ROB ROY

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with filled ice. Stir well. Strain into
chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
fields.name: ROSE

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain
in old fashioned or cobbler glass. If served "On the rocks", strain ingredients
into old fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with half orange slice and
maraschino cherry.
fields.name: WHISKEY SOUR

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled
cocktail glass . Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
fields.name: BRANDY ALEXANDER

fields.directions:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir
gently.
fields.name: BLACK RUSSIAN

fields.directions:
Pour coffee liqueur and vodka directly into old fashioned glass filled with
 ice. Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly..
fields.name: WHITE RUSSIAN

fields.directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned with ice cubes. Stir gently.
fields.name: FRENCH CONNECTION

fields.directions: Pour all ingredients directly in old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
fields.name: GOD MOTHER

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
fields.name: GOLDEN CADILLAC

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
fields.name: GOLDEN DREAM

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
fields.name: GRASSHOPPER

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain
 into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
fields.name: PORTO FLIP

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
Garnish with lemon twist.
fields.name: RUSTY NAIL

fields.directions: Garnish with slice of peach.
fields.name: BELLINI

fields.directions:
Add dashes of Worchestershire Sauce, Tabasco , salt and pepper into highball
glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish
with Celery Salt and lemon wedge (optional).
fields.name: BLOODY MARY

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well. Strain into a highball
with ice cubes. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
fields.name: BRANDY EGG NOG

fields.directions: Pour orange juice into flûte and gently pour Champagne or Dry Sparkling Wine. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist (optional)
fields.name: BUCK'S FIZZ

fields.directions: Pour orange juice into flûte and gently pour sparkling wine. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist (optional)
fields.name: MIMOSA

fields.directions: (Note: May be served hot in cold weather).
fields.name: BULL SHOT

fields.directions:
Add two dashes Angostura Bitter into flute, and one half sugar cube. Pour gently
chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry
fields.name: CHAMPAGNE COCKTAIL

fields.directions: (Note: Use 'Old Tom' Gin for Tom Collins).
fields.name: JOHN COLLINS

fields.directions:
Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into highball glass.
Top with Soda water.
fields.name: GIN FIZZ

fields.directions:
Pour vodka and orange juice directly into highball, filled with ice cubes, stir
gently, add (float) Liquore Galliano on the top . Garnish with orange slice and
maraschino cherry.
fields.name: HARVEY WALLBANGER

fields.directions:
Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently.
Garnish with rind of one lemon spiral. If required, add dashes of Angostura
Bitter.
fields.name: HORSE'S NECK

fields.directions:
Float Cream on top. Suggested to use a coffee spoon, place near the surface of
glass and pour the cream gently over to enable it to float.
fields.name: IRISH COFFEE

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into blender or shaker with crushed ice. Blend or shake until smooth. Pour
  into chilled glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry and straw.
fields.name: PINA COLADA

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into highball
with ice. Top up with Soda water. Stir gently and add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish with lemon and orange
slices.
fields.name: PLANTER'S PUNCH

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
Garnish with orange slice.
fields.name: SCREWDRIVER

fields.directions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
Shake well. Strain into highball glass. 
Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry.
fields.name: SINGAPORE SLING

fields.directions:
Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash
of Grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and cherry, straw and stirrer.
fields.name: TEQUILA SUNRISE
